text: Fire Shrine

Your commitment to
your quest is tested
here with the ruthless

Warbane. Only your
passion to rescue Link
and save Tolemac will

defeat his fiery
battles.

args.__label: Multiply defense for Zelda's strength boost

args.text: Should be possible to use enemy position to set collectable position

text:
Begone! I, Blacksmith,
have my work to do -
no time for intruders!

args.__label: Multiply defense for Zelda's strength boost

args.text: Should be possible to use enemy position to set collectable position

text:
At last, you got a 
compass! You can use it
to warp to the shrine

entrance anywhere on 
the world map. Find it
on the status screen.

Feel the tip of my
spears and tell me they
are the finest in
Tolemac!

At last, you got a map!
Press the SELECT 
Button to look at it!

text:
You've learned the
Hammer spell!

Further you will not go!
You have not the fire

in the belly to do else
but obey me!

text:
Let no one say my
welcome is not a warm
one! *laughing*

Do you still want my
Celestial Sign, timid
one?

text:
The Sign is rightly my
own! No slip of a girl
can take it from me.

MINE! Only I have the
fire in my heart to keep
it.

Zelda, life is always one
order more horrifying
than you expect.

The great evil Ganon
spoiled your victory.

Make haste! Do not let
him out of your sight.
